action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant in the cupboard, the orange on the table and the book on the shelf.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
> open refrigerator
Turn 1
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a peach, a sandwich, a orange and a banana.
> take orange
Turn 2
You take the orange. In your inventory you have a orange.
> close refrigerator
Turn 3
The refrigerator is now closed.
> go to kitchen
Turn 4
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
> open cupboard
Turn 5
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
> put orange on counter
Turn 6
You put the orange on the counter.
> go to living room
Turn 7
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
> go to hallway
Turn 8
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom and a broom closet here.
> take potted plant
Turn 9
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant.
> go to kitchen
Turn 10
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
> go to living room
Turn 11
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
> go to kitchen
Turn 12

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a orange, a cupboard and a plate. The orange is on the counter. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
> put potted plant in cupboard
Turn 13
You put the potted plant in the cupboard.
> go to living room
Turn 14
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> go to hallway
> go to bedroom
Turn 15
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom and a broom closet here.
> go to bedroom
Turn 16
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
> open wardrobe
Turn 17
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there are a book and a pillow.
> take book
Turn 18
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
Turn 19
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom and a broom closet here.
> go to living room
Turn 20
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
> put book on table
Turn 21
You put the book on the table.
